title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Appoint Individuals to Key Administration Posts â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
July 14, 2020
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced his intent to appoint the following individuals to key positions in his Administration:Sean M. Bigley, of California, to be a Member of the National Security Education Board for a term of four years.Dr. Sebastian Gorka, of Virginia, to be a Member of the National Security Education Board for a term of four years.Geoffrey C. Shepard, of Pennsylvania, to be a Member of the National Historical Publications and Records Commission.Andrew Olmem, of Virginia, to be a Member of the J. William Fulbright Foreign Scholarship Board.
